title: The permissible FSI shall be on plot area including areas to be surrendered to MCGM/Appropriate Authority under Regulation no
clause_text: The permissible FSI shall be on plot area including areas to be surrendered to MCGM/Appropriate Authority under Regulation no.35 (development of cotton textile mills).(Kept in abeyance)
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones

source_pdf.text_snippet: The permissible FSI shall be on plot area including areas to be surrendered to MCGM/Appropriate Authority under Regulation no.35 (development of cotton textile mills).(Kept in abeyance)
